solution_line_template: Janine read {books_last_month} x {multiplier_this_month} = <<{books_last_month}*{multiplier_this_month}={books_this_month}>>{books_this_month} books this month.
So, she read a total of {books_last_month} + {books_this_month} = <<{books_last_month}+{books_this_month}={total_books}>>{total_books} books.
Therefore, she read {total_books} x {pages_per_book} = <<{total_books}*{pages_per_book}={total_pages}>>{total_pages} pages in all.
